name: Shay Doron
description:
Before Shay Doron led the University of Maryland to the NCAA basketball title...

Before she became the first Israeli and that rare Jew to play in the WNBA, for the New York Liberty in 2007...

Before she led her Israeli club team to the EuroCup and starred for the national team...

Shay Doron played for that New York City powerhouse, Christ the King Regional High School. Go Fightin' Crucifixes!!!

It's actually the Royals, but still...
